title: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the application, the column icons are not displayed.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the application.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons should be displayed in the application.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Navigate to a table with columns.
4. Observe that the column icons are missing.
